recipe.title: Margarita
ingredients: 2 ounces reposado or blanco (silver) tequila made from 100 percent agave
instructions: Before chilling your glass, moisten its outside rim to a depth of 1/2 inch with the lemon wedge and then roll the rim in salt. Shake the tequila, Cointreau, and lime juice and strain into the chilled glass.
